峐字的基本解释

峐
gāi
没有草木的山。
山名。

峐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gāi］
［《廣韻》古哀切，平咍，見。］
(1)山无草木，与“屺”同义。
(2)山名。

峐字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峐； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页310第25
【廣韻】古哀切【集韻】柯開切，?音垓。【爾雅·釋山】無草木峐。【疏】峐，當作屺。　又地名。【正字通】突厥地名。有可洛峐。　又【集韻】口已切。同屺。

峐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
峐字的起名意思

暂无。

峐
Basic explanation of words
峐
gāi
A mountain without vegetation.
Mountain name.
峐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gāi］
["Guangyun" ancient mourning, ping 咍, see you. ]
(1) The mountain has no vegetation, which is synonymous with "Qi".
(2) The name of the mountain.
峐
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峐; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 310 25
[Guangyun] Ancient Lamentation [Jiyun] Ke Kaiqie,? Yin Gai. [Erya Shishan] There is no grass and trees. 【Sparse】峐, regarded as Qi.　Also place name. [Zhengzitong] Turkic place names. There is Keluoqi.　[Jiyun] The mouth has been cut. Same as Qi.
峐

сущ. гора без растительности, лысая гора
